author: zemse
content:
Thats great, thanks for sharing.
In this proposal it is mentioned cost of the proposed opcode EXTSLOAD = cost of EXTCODE + cost of SLOAD. 
Since if self contract knows which slot id it wants to read from which target contract, the bytecode of the target contract does not provide any useful information and I think the target contract address and slot id is enough for the geth node (and others) to fetch the slot value from the SSD, so the cost could be simply a cost of a SLOAD. (Pls correct me if I'm wrong).
